Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate any information.
Understate: The claim does not understate any information.
Lack enough support: The claim does not lack enough support as it provides evidence and analysis to support its conclusion.
Problematic assumption: The claim does not make any problematic assumptions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide alternative explanations.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image has been digitally manipulated and the original sign did not mention Trump.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at times as it provides consistent information and analysis.
